quotes.quote: To make a difference, understand that difficulty and change are the only constants.
There's only one way to succeed in anything, and that is to give it everything.
I didn't come here to be average. ~ Unknown
When you want to succeed as bad as you want to breathe, then you’ll be successful. – Eric Thomas
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop. – Confucius
The only way to do great work is to love what you do. – Steve Jobs
Pressure is a privilege – it only comes to those who earn it. – Billie Jean King
Today I will do what others won’t, so tomorrow I can accomplish what others can’t. – Jerry Rice
